archimate:Principle.name: <<ELAP:ArchitecturePrinciple>> Privacy
archimate:Principle.documentation:
http://data.europa.eu/2sa/elap/privacy Signifies the agreement to the processing of personal data related to an individual Rationale Privacy refers to any freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous indication of the data subject's wishes by which he or she, by a statement or by clear affirmative action, signifies agreement to the processing of personal data relating to him or her.
Additionally, it refers to ensuring that the vast amounts of citizens' personal data held and processed by public bodies are protected by complying with the applicable legal framework.
A relevant aspect to consider when focusing on the application of privacy is full compliance with GDPR Regulation. Principle Source Security and Privacy Underlying Principle (8) of the European Interoperability Framework (EIF)
